q: "My impression is that the Barack Obama administration is taking steps that at least symbolically have distanced his White House from what I have throughout my career valued as a special relationship," Mr Donald Rumsfeld told I don't know what it looks like from the other side of the pond, but certainly here it has dramatised the things that the Barack Obama administration has done that are unhelpful to the relationship.
